alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:31PM EDT until June 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Southwest Charlotte to near Richburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Indian Land, Kershaw, Elgin, Heath Springs, Andrew Jackson State Park, USC Lancaster, Van Wyck, Irwin, Buford, Bell Town Fire Station, Arrowood Estates, Camp Creek Fire Station, Community of Almond Glen, Antioch, Kirk Air Base, Faith Christian School, Pleasant Hill, Unity Fire Station and Lancaster Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
